text:
<Munny cries on the bed with a bandage tied to her hand >

HERO : yemyndhi
Hf : idhi okadini love cehsindhi 
       aadu inkokartini love chesadu 
       recent ga adhi vaadiki hand icchindhi.. dheeeni hand tegindhi..

H :  Adhi vaadiki hand iste idenduku cheyyi kosukundhi…
Hf:  aa hand icchindhi dheeni chelli kabatti.. mosam chesindhi ani…

Hf : arey  bhatuku jatkabandi case ra idhi…
MUnny : Nannu kodhi sepu ontari ga vadileyandi plz…
  <everyone looks at each other>
swarna : Papam ilanti situations ela handle chestaro ento..
Hero : Set aipothadi le.
SWarna  : Sucide attempt ante china vishayam kadhu. chala dhairyam Kavali. chala...Mentally she’s not well..
Hero : manaki enduku raavu  ilanti dailogues..
